  // title
  svg.append("text")
    .attr("x", 20)
    .attr("y", 25)
    .attr("text-anchor", "start")
    .attr("fill", "currentColor")
    .attr("font-size", "18px")
    .attr("font-family", "system-ui")
    .attr("font-weight", "normal")
    .text("Photovoltaic Potential Condition Level Distribution");
  
  // subtitle
  svg.append("text")
    .attr("x", 20)
    .attr("y", 45)
    .attr("text-anchor", "start")
    .attr("fill", "currentColor")
    .attr("font-size", "16px")
    .attr("font-family", "system-ui")
    .attr("font-style", "italic")
    .attr("font-weight", "normal")
    .text(`${cityName}, ${countryName} (${pv.length}-month period)`);
  
  // caption
  svg.append("text")
    .attr("x", 20)
    .attr("y", height - 10)
    .attr("text-anchor", "start")
    .attr("fill", "#666")
    .attr("font-size", "10px")
    .attr("font-family", "system-ui")
    .text("Data: Solargis/World Bank, Global Solar Atlas 2 | Condition Classification: World Bank");
  
  // y-axis label
  svg.append("text")
    .attr("transform", "rotate(-90)")
    .attr("y", 20)
    .attr("x", -(margin.top + innerHeight/2))
    .attr("text-anchor", "middle")
    .attr("fill", "currentColor")
    .attr("font-size", Math.max(11, Math.min(16, 13 * dynamicScale)) + "px")
    .attr("font-family", "system-ui")
    .attr("font-weight", "normal")
    .text(yLabel);
  
  // x-axis label
  svg.append("text")
    .attr("x", margin.left + innerWidth/2)
    .attr("y", height - 55)
    .attr("text-anchor", "middle")
    .attr("fill", "currentColor")
    .attr("font-size", Math.max(11, Math.min(16, 13 * dynamicScale)) + "px")
    .attr("font-family", "system-ui")
    .attr("font-weight", "normal")
    .text(xLabel);
  
  return svg.node();
}

// function with d3.js that plots pv to create pv chart (i.e., Seasonal Availability of Solar Energy, January - December)
function plot_pv(pv, {
  cityName = "City", 
  countryName = "",
  width = plotWidth,
  color = "black"
} = {}) {
  
  const height = width * 0.6;
  const margin = {
    top: 70,
    right: Math.max(20, width * 0.02), 
    bottom: Math.max(90, width * 0.1),
    left: Math.max(80, width * 0.08)
  };
  const innerWidth = width - margin.left - margin.right;
  const innerHeight = height - margin.top - margin.bottom;
  
  // scales
  const xScale = d3.scaleBand()
    .domain(pv.map(d => d.monthName))
    .range([0, innerWidth])
    .padding(0.1);
    
  const yScale = d3.scaleLinear()
    .domain([0, Math.max(...pv.map(d => d.maxPv)) * 1.1])
    .range([innerHeight, 0]);

  // svg
  const svg = d3.create("svg")
    .attr("width", width)
    .attr("height", height)
    .style("background", "white")
    .style("font", "10px system-ui");

  const g = svg.append("g")
    .attr("transform", `translate(${margin.left},${margin.top})`);
  
  // y-axis with grid lines
  const yTicks = Math.max(4, Math.min(10, Math.floor(width * 0.6) / 60));
  const yAxisGroup = g.append("g").attr("class", "y-axis");
  const yAxisCall = d3.axisLeft(yScale)
    .ticks(yTicks)
    .tickSizeOuter(0)
    .tickSizeInner(-innerWidth)
    .tickFormat(d3.format("~s"));

  yAxisGroup.call(yAxisCall);
  yAxisGroup.select(".domain").remove();
  yAxisGroup.selectAll(".tick line")
    .attr("stroke", "#f0f0f0")
    .attr("stroke-width", 1);
  yAxisGroup.selectAll(".tick text")
    .attr("fill", "currentColor")
    .attr("font-size", "10px")
    .attr("font-family", "system-ui")
    .attr("font-weight", "normal");
  
  // x-axis
  const xAxisGroup = g.append("g")
    .attr("class", "x-axis")
    .attr("transform", `translate(0,${innerHeight})`);
    
  xAxisGroup.call(d3.axisBottom(xScale)
    .tickSizeOuter(0)
    .tickSizeInner(-innerHeight));
  xAxisGroup.select(".domain")
    .attr("stroke", "currentColor")
    .attr("stroke-width", 1);

  xAxisGroup.selectAll(".tick line")
    .attr("stroke", "#f0f0f0")
    .attr("stroke-width", 1);

  xAxisGroup.selectAll(".tick text")
    .attr("fill", "currentColor")
    .attr("font-size", "10px")
    .attr("font-family", "system-ui")
    .attr("font-weight", "normal");
  
  // horizontal dashed lines for conditions
  g.append("line")
    .attr("x1", 0)
    .attr("x2", innerWidth)
    .attr("y1", yScale(4.5))
    .attr("y2", yScale(4.5))
    .attr("stroke", "gray")
    .attr("stroke-width", 1.5)
    .attr("stroke-dasharray", "5,5");
    
  g.append("line")
    .attr("x1", 0)
    .attr("x2", innerWidth)
    .attr("y1", yScale(3.5))
    .attr("y2", yScale(3.5))
    .attr("stroke", "gray")
    .attr("stroke-width", 1.5)
    .attr("stroke-dasharray", "5,5");
  
  // condition labels
  g.append("text")
    .attr("x", innerWidth / 2)
    .attr("y", yScale(4.5) - 8)
    .attr("text-anchor", "middle")
    .attr("fill", "gray")
    .attr("font-size", "14px")
    .attr("font-family", "system-ui")
    .attr("font-weight", "bold")
    .text("Excellent Conditions");
    
  g.append("text")
    .attr("x", innerWidth / 2)
    .attr("y", yScale(3.5) - 8)
    .attr("text-anchor", "middle")
    .attr("fill", "gray")
    .attr("font-size", "14px")
    .attr("font-family", "system-ui")
    .attr("font-weight", "bold")
    .text("Favorable Conditions");
  
  // line
  const line = d3.line()
    .x(d => xScale(d.monthName) + xScale.bandwidth() / 2)
    .y(d => yScale(d.maxPv));
    
  g.append("path")
    .datum(pv)
    .attr("fill", "none")
    .attr("stroke", "black")
    .attr("stroke-width", Math.max(1.5, Math.min(3, width / 400)))
    .attr("d", line);
  
  // dots
  g.selectAll(".dot")
    .data(pv)
    .enter().append("circle")
    .attr("class", "dot")
    .attr("cx", d => xScale(d.monthName) + xScale.bandwidth() / 2)
    .attr("cy", d => yScale(d.maxPv))
    .attr("r", Math.max(2, Math.min(3, width / 200)))
    .attr("fill", "black")
    .style("cursor", "default")
    .on("mouseover", function(event, d) {
      d3.selectAll(".d3-tooltip").remove();

      const tooltip = d3.select("body").append("div")
        .attr("class", "d3-tooltip")
        .style("position", "absolute")
        .style("background", "white")
        .style("color", "black")
        .style("padding", "8px 12px")
        .style("border", "1.8px solid #000000")
        .style("font-family", "system-ui")
        .style("font-size", "12px")
        .style("font-weight", "normal")
        .style("line-height", "1.4")
        .style("box-shadow", "0 2px 8px rgba(0,0,0,0.15)")
        .style("pointer-events", "none")
        .style("z-index", "1000")
        .style("opacity", 0);
        
      tooltip.html(`<div>Month: ${d.monthName}</div><div>Daily PV energy yield: ${d.maxPv} kWh/kWp</div>`)
        .style("left", (event.pageX - 60) + "px")
        .style("top", (event.pageY - 60) + "px")
        .transition()
        .duration(200)
        .style("opacity", 1);
    })
    .on("mousemove", function(event) {
      const tooltip = d3.select(".d3-tooltip");
      if (!tooltip.empty()) {
        tooltip
          .style("left", (event.pageX - 60) + "px")
          .style("top", (event.pageY - 60) + "px");
      }
    })
    .on("mouseout", function() {
      d3.selectAll(".d3-tooltip")
        .transition()
        .duration(200)
        .style("opacity", 0)
        .remove();
    });
  
  // title
  svg.append("text")
    .attr("x", 20)
    .attr("y", 25)
    .attr("text-anchor", "start")
    .attr("fill", "currentColor")
    .attr("font-size", "18px") 
    .attr("font-family", "system-ui")
    .attr("font-weight", "normal")
    .text("Seasonal Availability of Solar Energy, January - December");
    
  // subtitle
  svg.append("text")
    .attr("x", 20)
    .attr("y", 45)
    .attr("text-anchor", "start")
    .attr("fill", "currentColor")
    .attr("font-size", "16px")
    .attr("font-family", "system-ui")
    .attr("font-style", "italic")
    .attr("font-weight", "normal")
    .text(`${cityName}, ${countryName}`);
    
  // y-axis label
  svg.append("text")
    .attr("transform", "rotate(-90)")
    .attr("y", 20)
    .attr("x", -(margin.top + innerHeight/2))
    .attr("text-anchor", "middle")
    .attr("fill", "currentColor")
    .attr("font-size", "11px")
    .attr("font-family", "system-ui")
    .attr("font-weight", "normal")
    .text("Daily PV energy yield (kWh/kWp)");
    
  // x-axis label
  svg.append("text")
    .attr("x", margin.left + innerWidth/2)
    .attr("y", height - 45)
    .attr("text-anchor", "middle")
    .attr("fill", "currentColor")
    .attr("font-size", "11px")
    .attr("font-family", "system-ui")
    .attr("font-weight", "normal")
    .text("Month");
    
  return svg.node();
}

// helper function for plot_aq function (i.e., functions that plots the air quality chart) that sorts the air quality bins numerically so that the data gets plotted from smallest to highest 2019 levels of PM2.5 g/m3
function parseAirQualityRange(bin) {
    const binStr = String(bin);
    
    if (binStr.includes('-')) {
      const [start] = binStr.split('-').map(x => parseFloat(x));
      return start;
    }
    
    return parseFloat(binStr);
  }

// function with d3.js that plots, aq, percentage distribution to create aq chart (i.e., air quality chart) using styling for visual cohesion with air quality map)
function plot_aq(aq_area, {
    cityName = "City", 
    countryName = "",
    width = plotWidth,
    color = "black"
  } = {}) {
    
    const sortedData = aq_area.slice().sort((a, b) => 
      parseAirQualityRange(a.bin) - parseAirQualityRange(b.bin)
    );
  
    // air quality colors given current mapped colors
    const airQualityColorMap = {
      "0-5": "#fff7de",           // [0-5)
      "5-10": "#f8dbc4",          // [5-10)
      "10-15": "#eec0ae",         // [10-15)
      "15-20": "#e0a79d",         // [15-20)
      "20-30": "#d5949f",         // [20-30)
      "30-40": "#cf94aa" ,        // [30-40)
      "40-50": "#c394b5",         // [40-50)
      "50-100": "#c394b5" ,       // [50-100)
      "100+": "#a07ca0" ,         // [100+)
    };
      
    // calculate total area to show complete distribution
    const totalCount = sortedData.reduce((sum, d) => sum + d.count, 0);
    
    // define all possible air quality concentrations of PM2.5 g/m3 bins
    const allAirQualityBins = sortedData.map(d => d.bin);
    
    // complete data with gray bars for visual completeness
    const completeData = allAirQualityBins.map(bin => {
      const existing = sortedData.find(d => d.bin === bin);
      return existing || { bin, count: 0, percentage: 0 };
    });
    
    const height = width * 0.6;
    const margin = {
      top: 70,
      right: Math.max(20, width * 0.02), 
      bottom: Math.max(90, width * 0.1),
      left: Math.max(80, width * 0.08)
    };
    const innerWidth = width - margin.left - margin.right;
    const innerHeight = height - margin.top - margin.bottom;
    
    const xScale = d3.scaleBand()
      .domain(completeData.map(d => d.bin))
      .range([0, innerWidth])
      .padding(0.1);
      
    const yScale = d3.scaleLinear()
      .domain([0, 100])
      .range([innerHeight, 0]);
  
    // svg
    const svg = d3.create("svg")
      .attr("width", width)
      .attr("height", height)
      .style("background", "white")
      .style("font", "10 px system-ui"); // Observable Plot default styling to match other plots
  
    const g = svg.append("g")
      .attr("transform", `translate(${margin.left},${margin.top})`);
    
    // y-axis with grid lines (behind bars)
    const yTicks = Math.max(4, Math.min(10, Math.floor(width * 0.6) / 60));
    const yAxisGroup = g.append("g").attr("class", "y-axis");
    const yAxisCall = d3.axisLeft(yScale)
      .ticks(yTicks)
      .tickSizeOuter(0)
      .tickSizeInner(-innerWidth)
      .tickFormat(d3.format("~s"));
  
    // y-axis to match Observable Plot default styling
    yAxisGroup.call(yAxisCall);
    yAxisGroup.select(".domain").remove();
    yAxisGroup.selectAll(".tick line")
      .attr("stroke", "#f0f0f0")
      .attr("stroke-width", 1);
    yAxisGroup.selectAll(".tick text")
      .attr("fill", "currentColor")
      .attr("font-size", "10px")
      .attr("font-family", "system-ui")
      .attr("font-weight", "normal");
      
    // gray background bars for all bins
    g.selectAll(".background-bar")
      .data(completeData)
      .enter().append("rect")
      .attr("class", "background-bar")
      .attr("x", d => xScale(d.bin))
      .attr("width", xScale.bandwidth())
      .attr("y", 0)
      .attr("height", innerHeight)
      .attr("fill", "#f8f9fa")
      .attr("stroke", "#dee2e6")
      .attr("stroke-width", 0.5)
      .attr("fill-opacity", 0.3);
      
    // actual data bars with color mapping
    g.selectAll(".data-bar")
      .data(completeData.filter(d => d.percentage > 0))
      .enter().append("rect")
      .attr("class", "data-bar")
      .attr("x", d => xScale(d.bin))
      .attr("width", xScale.bandwidth())
      .attr("y", d => yScale(d.percentage))
      .attr("height", d => innerHeight - yScale(d.percentage))
      .attr("fill", d => airQualityColorMap[d.bin] || color) // use mapped color or fallback, "color"
      .attr("fill-opacity", 1)
      .attr("stroke", d => d3.color(airQualityColorMap[d.bin] || color).darker(0.5)) //use mapped color or fallback, "color"
      .attr("stroke-width", 1)
      .style("cursor", "default")
      .on("mouseover", function(event, d) {
        // remove any existing tooltips
        d3.selectAll(".d3-tooltip").remove();
  
        // tooltip = create Observable Plot default style tooltip with pointer
        const tooltip = d3.select("body").append("div")
          .attr("class", "d3-tooltip")
          .style("position", "absolute")
          .style("background", "white")
          .style("color", "black")
          .style("padding", "8px 12px")
          .style("border", "1.8px solid #000000")
          .style("font-family", "system-ui")
          .style("font-size", "12px")
          .style("font-weight", "normal")
          .style("line-height", "1.4")
          .style("box-shadow", "0 2px 8px rgba(0,0,0,0.15)")
          .style("pointer-events", "none")
          .style("z-index", "1000")
          .style("opacity", 0);
                  
        // tooltip, add pointer arrow with css
        tooltip.append("div")
          .style("position", "absolute")
          .style("bottom", "-7px")
          .style("left", "50%")
          .style("transform", "translateX(-50%)")
          .style("width", "0")
          .style("height", "0")
          .style("border-left", "7px solid transparent")
          .style("border-right", "7px solid transparent")
          .style("border-top", "7px solid white");
  
        // tooltip - border for arrow
        tooltip.append("div")
          .style("position", "absolute")
          .style("bottom", "-7px")
          .style("left", "50%")
          .style("transform", "translateX(-50%)")
          .style("width", "0")
          .style("height", "0")
          .style("border-left", "7px solid transparent")
          .style("border-right", "7px solid transparent")
          .style("border-top", "7px solid #ccc");
          
        tooltip.html(`<div>PM 2.5: ${d.bin} g/m<sup>3</sup></div><div>Percentage of Area: ${d.percentage.toFixed(1)}%</div>`)
          .style("left", (event.pageX - 60) + "px")
          .style("top", (event.pageY - 60) + "px")
          .transition()
          .duration(200)
          .style("opacity", 1);
      })
      .on("mousemove", function(event, d) {
        // only update position if tooltip exists
        const tooltip = d3.select(".d3-tooltip");
        if (!tooltip.empty()) {
          tooltip
            .style("left", (event.pageX - 60) + "px")
            .style("top", (event.pageY - 60) + "px");
        }
      })
      .on("mouseout", function() {
        d3.selectAll(".d3-tooltip")
          .transition()
          .duration(200)
          .style("opacity", 0)
          .remove();
      });
  
    // text labels for all bars (to match Observable Plot default styling - lighter weight)
    g.selectAll(".bar-label")
      .data(completeData)
      .enter().append("text")
      .attr("x", d => xScale(d.bin) + xScale.bandwidth()/2)
      .attr("y", d => d.percentage > 0 ? 
        yScale(d.percentage) - 8 : 
        innerHeight/2) // center for zero values
      .attr("text-anchor", "middle")
      .attr("fill", d => d.percentage > 0 ? "black" : "#6c757d")
      .attr("font-size", Math.max(9, Math.min(12, width / 60)) + "px")
      .attr("font-family", "system-ui")
      .attr("font-weight", "normal")
      .attr("font-style", d => d.percentage > 0 ? "normal" : "italic")
      .text(d => d.percentage > 0 ? 
        `${d.percentage.toFixed(1)}%` : 
        "0.0%")
      .style("display", d => d.percentage > 2 || d.percentage === 0 ? "block" : "none"); // show labels for significant values or zeros
  
    // x-axis - to match Observable Plot default styling
    const xAxisGroup = g.append("g")
      .attr("class", "x-axis")
      .attr("transform", `translate(0,${innerHeight})`);
      
    xAxisGroup.call(d3.axisBottom(xScale)
      .tickSizeOuter(0)
      .tickSizeInner(0));
    xAxisGroup.select(".domain")
      .attr("stroke", "currentColor")
      .attr("stroke-width", 1);
    xAxisGroup.selectAll(".tick text")
      .attr("fill", "currentColor")
      .attr("font-size", "10px")
      .attr("font-family", "system-ui")
      .attr("font-weight", "normal");
      
    if (width < 500) {
      xAxisGroup.selectAll("text")
        .style("text-anchor", "end")
        .attr("dx", "-.8em")
        .attr("dy", ".15em")
        .attr("transform", "rotate(-45)");
    }
      
    // title
    svg.append("text")
      .attr("x", 20)
      .attr("y", 25)
      .attr("text-anchor", "start")
      .attr("fill", "currentColor")
      .attr("font-size", "18px") 
      .attr("font-family", "system-ui")
      .attr("font-weight", "normal")
      .text("Air Quality");
      
    // subtitle
    const titleLocation = countryName ? `${cityName}, ${countryName}` : cityName;
    svg.append("text")
      .attr("x", 20)
      .attr("y", 45)
      .attr("text-anchor", "start")
      .attr("fill", "currentColor")
      .attr("font-size", "16px")
      .attr("font-family", "system-ui")
      .attr("font-style", "italic")
      .attr("font-weight", "normal")
      .text(titleLocation);
      
    // y-axis label - to match Observable Plot default styling
    svg.append("text")
      .attr("transform", "rotate(-90)")
      .attr("y", 20)
      .attr("x", -(margin.top + innerHeight/2))
      .attr("text-anchor", "middle")
      .attr("fill", "currentColor")
      .attr("font-size", "11px")
      .attr("font-family", "system-ui")
      .attr("font-weight", "normal")
      .text("Percentage of Area (%)");
      
    // x-axis label - to match Observable Plot defaulty styling
    svg.append("text")
      .attr("x", margin.left + innerWidth/2)
      .attr("y", height - 45)
      .attr("text-anchor", "middle")
      .attr("fill", "currentColor")
      .attr("font-size", "11px")
      .attr("font-family", "system-ui")
      .attr("font-weight", "normal")
      .text("Concentrations of PM2.5");
      
    // caption (add in text later if necessary)
    svg.append("text")
      .attr("x", 20)
      .attr("y", height - 15)
      .attr("text-anchor", "start")
      .attr("fill", "#6c757d")
      .attr("font-size", "9px")
      .attr("font-family", "system-ui")
      .attr("font-weight", "normal")
      .text("");
      
    return svg.node();
  }

// helper function for plot_summer function (i.e., functions that plots the summer surface temperature chart) that sorts the summer surface temperatures in degrees Celsius (C) bins numerically so that the data gets plotted from smallest to highest degrees Celsius (C)
function parseSummerRange(bin) {
    const binStr = String(bin);
    
    if (binStr.includes('-')) {
      const [start] = binStr.split('-').map(x => parseFloat(x));
      return start;
    }
    
    return parseFloat(binStr);
  }

// function with d3.js that plots summer_area, percentage distribution to create summer surface temperature chart using styling for visual cohesion with summer surface temperature map)
function plot_summer_area(summer_area, {
    cityName = "City", 
    countryName = "",
    width = plotWidth,
    color = "#ff6b35"
  } = {}) {
    
    const sortedData = summer_area.slice().sort((a, b) => {
      const aTemp = parseInt(a.bin.split('-')[0]);
      const bTemp = parseInt(b.bin.split('-')[0]);
      return aTemp - bTemp;
    });
  
    // get temperature range from data
    const minTemp = parseInt(sortedData[0].bin.split('-')[0]);
    const maxTemp = parseInt(sortedData[sortedData.length - 1].bin.split('-')[1]);
    
    // color scale (for visual cohesion with summer surface temperature map), where: blue, cool (cooler temperatures) to red, hot (hotter temperatures) gradient
    const colorScale = d3.scaleLinear()
      .domain([
        minTemp, 
        minTemp + (maxTemp - minTemp) * 0.33,
        minTemp + (maxTemp - minTemp) * 0.67,
        maxTemp
      ])
      .range(["#8db4d4", "#d3daba", "#f2cb94", "#e37b74"])
      .interpolate(d3.interpolateRgb);
  
    // alternative hexcodes - cold to hot gradient that is technically not visually cohesive with the summer surface temperature map (i.e, did not select via hexcode finder), however they "look" more cohesive - 
  
      // "20-25": "#d4e8f7", (blue)
      // "25-30": "#a8d5ed",
      // "30-35": "#7ec3e3",
      // "35-40": "#f9c74f",
      // "40-45": "#f8961e",
      // "45-50": "#f3722c",
      // "50-55": "#f94144" (red)
    
    // create color map for all temperature bins in data
    const tempColorMap = {};
    sortedData.forEach(d => {
      // Use the midpoint of each bin for color mapping
      const binStart = parseInt(d.bin.split('-')[0]);
      const binEnd = parseInt(d.bin.split('-')[1]);
      const binMidpoint = (binStart + binEnd) / 2;
      tempColorMap[d.bin] = colorScale(binMidpoint);
    });
      
    // calculate total to show complete distribution
    const totalCount = sortedData.reduce((sum, d) => sum + d.count, 0);
    
    // define all possible temperature bins from data
    const allTempBins = sortedData.map(d => d.bin);
    
    // complete data with gray bars for visual completeness

        tooltip.html(`<div>Temperature: ${d.bin}C</div><div>Percentage of Area: ${d.percentage.toFixed(1)}%</div>`)

    return svg.node();
  }

// helper function for plot_ndvi function (i.e., functions that plots the green space, NDVI chart) that sorts the NDVI bins numerically so that the data gets plotted from smallest to highest NDVI
function parseNdviRange(bin) {
    const binStr = String(bin);
    
    if (binStr.includes('-')) {
      const [start] = binStr.split('-').map(x => parseFloat(x));
      return start;
    }
    
    return parseFloat(binStr);
  }

    const sortedData = ndvi_area.slice().sort((a, b) =>

// function with d3.js that plots cumulative forest loss over time to create deforestation_area1 chart
function plot_deforestation_area1(deforestation_area, {
  cityName = "City",
  countryName = "",
  width = plotWidth,
  xLabel = "Year",
  yLabel = "Percentage of Forest Loss (%)",
  color = "black"
} = {}) {
  
  const height = width * 0.6;
  const margin = {
    top: 70,
    right: Math.max(20, width * 0.02), 
    bottom: Math.max(90, width * 0.1),
    left: Math.max(80, width * 0.08)
  };
  const innerWidth = width - margin.left - margin.right;
  const innerHeight = height - margin.top - margin.bottom;
  
  // year range
  const minYear = d3.min(deforestation_area, d => d.year);
  const maxYear = d3.max(deforestation_area, d => d.year);
  
  // scales
  const xScale = d3.scaleLinear()
    .domain(d3.extent(deforestation_area, d => d.year))
    .range([0, innerWidth]);
    
  const yScale = d3.scaleLinear()
    .domain([0, Math.max(...deforestation_area.map(d => d.percent_forest_lost)) * 1.1])
    .range([innerHeight, 0]);

  // svg
  const svg = d3.create("svg")
    .attr("width", width)
    .attr("height", height)
    .style("background", "white")
    .style("font", "10px system-ui");

  const g = svg.append("g")
    .attr("transform", `translate(${margin.left},${margin.top})`);
  
  // y-axis with grid lines
  const yTicks = Math.max(4, Math.min(10, Math.floor(width * 0.6) / 60));
  const yAxisGroup = g.append("g").attr("class", "y-axis");
  const yAxisCall = d3.axisLeft(yScale)
    .ticks(yTicks)
    .tickSizeOuter(0)
    .tickSizeInner(-innerWidth)
    .tickFormat(d3.format("~s"));

  yAxisGroup.call(yAxisCall);
  yAxisGroup.select(".domain").remove();
  yAxisGroup.selectAll(".tick line")
    .attr("stroke", "#f0f0f0")
    .attr("stroke-width", 1);
  yAxisGroup.selectAll(".tick text")
    .attr("fill", "currentColor")
    .attr("font-size", "10px")
    .attr("font-family", "system-ui")
    .attr("font-weight", "normal")
    .attr("dx", "-0.3em");
  
  // x-axis
  const xAxisGroup = g.append("g")
    .attr("class", "x-axis")
    .attr("transform", `translate(0,${innerHeight})`);
    
  xAxisGroup.call(d3.axisBottom(xScale)
    .ticks(Math.max(5, Math.min(15, Math.floor(width / 80))))
    .tickFormat(d3.format("d"))
    .tickSizeOuter(0)
    .tickSizeInner(-innerHeight));
  xAxisGroup.select(".domain")
    .attr("stroke", "currentColor")
    .attr("stroke-width", 1);

  xAxisGroup.selectAll(".tick line")
    .attr("stroke", "#f0f0f0")
    .attr("stroke-width", 1);

  xAxisGroup.selectAll(".tick text")
    .attr("fill", "currentColor")
    .attr("font-size", "10px")
    .attr("font-family", "system-ui")
    .attr("font-weight", "normal")
    .attr("dy", "1.5em");
  
  // line (with defined function to skip null values)
  const line = d3.line()
    .defined(d => d.percent_forest_lost !== null)
    .x(d => xScale(d.year))
    .y(d => yScale(d.percent_forest_lost));
    
  g.append("path")
    .datum(deforestation_area)
    .attr("fill", "none")
    .attr("stroke", color)
    .attr("stroke-width", Math.max(1.5, Math.min(3, width / 400)))
    .attr("d", line);
  
  // dots (filter out null values)
  g.selectAll(".dot")
    .data(deforestation_area.filter(d => d.percent_forest_lost !== null))
    .enter().append("circle")
    .attr("class", "dot")
    .attr("cx", d => xScale(d.year))
    .attr("cy", d => yScale(d.percent_forest_lost))
    .attr("r", Math.max(2, Math.min(3, width / 200)))
    .attr("fill", color)
    .style("cursor", "default")
    .on("mouseover", function(event, d) {
      d3.selectAll(".d3-tooltip").remove();

      const tooltip = d3.select("body").append("div")
        .attr("class", "d3-tooltip")
        .style("position", "absolute")
        .style("background", "white")
        .style("color", "black")
        .style("padding", "8px 12px")
        .style("border", "1.8px solid #000000")
        .style("font-family", "system-ui")
        .style("font-size", "12px")
        .style("font-weight", "normal")
        .style("line-height", "1.4")
        .style("box-shadow", "0 2px 8px rgba(0,0,0,0.15)")
        .style("pointer-events", "none")
        .style("z-index", "1000")
        .style("opacity", 0);
        
      tooltip.html(`<div>Year: ${d.year}</div><div>${yLabel}: ${d.percent_forest_lost.toFixed(2)}%</div>`)
        .style("left", (event.pageX - 60) + "px")
        .style("top", (event.pageY - 60) + "px")
        .transition()
        .duration(200)
        .style("opacity", 1);
    })

      const tooltip = d3.select(".d3-tooltip");
      if (!tooltip.empty()) {
        tooltip
          .style("left", (event.pageX - 60) + "px")
          .style("top", (event.pageY - 60) + "px");
      }
    })
    .on("mouseout", function() {
      d3.selectAll(".d3-tooltip")
        .transition()
        .duration(200)
        .style("opacity", 0)
        .remove();
    });
  
  // title
  svg.append("text")
    .attr("x", 20)
    .attr("y", 25)
    .attr("text-anchor", "start")
    .attr("fill", "currentColor")
    .attr("font-size", "18px") 
    .attr("font-family", "system-ui")
    .attr("font-weight", "normal")
    .text(`Cumulative Forest Loss Over Time, ${minYear}-${maxYear}`);
    
  // subtitle
  svg.append("text")
    .attr("x", 20)
    .attr("y", 45)
    .attr("text-anchor", "start")

    .attr("font-style", "italic")
    .attr("font-weight", "normal")

  svg.append("text")

    .attr("font-size", "11px")
    .attr("font-family", "system-ui")

  return svg.node();
}

// function with d3.js that plots deforestation_area data for the "annual deforestation as percentage of original forest" using styling for visual cohesion with deforestation map (i.e., City Scan, Climate Conditions, Forests & Deforestation, 2000-2020* (actually 2025, since data goes to 2023) map)
function plot_deforestation_area3(deforestation_area, {
    cityName = "City", 
    countryName = "",
    width = plotWidth,
    xLabel = "Year",
    yLabel = "Percent of Original Forest (%)",
  } = {}) {
    
    // sort data by year
    const sortedData = deforestation_area.slice().sort((a, b) => a.year - b.year);
  
    // year range from data
    const minYear = d3.min(sortedData, d => d.year);
    const maxYear = d3.max(sortedData, d => d.year);
    
    // color scale (for visual cohesion with deforestation map),  where: light yellow (early); orange (mid); dark red (recent)
      const colorScale = d3.scaleLinear()
      .domain([
        minYear, 
        minYear + (maxYear - minYear) * 0.33,
        minYear + (maxYear - minYear) * 0.67,
        maxYear
      ])
      .range(["#f3f14d", "#f2cc69", "#eead70", "#e47673"])
      .interpolate(d3.interpolateRgb);
    
    // create color map for all years in data
    const deforestationColorMap = {};
    sortedData.forEach(d => {
      deforestationColorMap[d.year] = colorScale(d.year);
    });
    
    const height = width * 0.6;
    const margin = {
      top: 70,
      right: Math.max(20, width * 0.02), 
      bottom: Math.max(90, width * 0.1),
      left: Math.max(80, width * 0.08)
    };
    const innerWidth = width - margin.left - margin.right;
    const innerHeight = height - margin.top - margin.bottom;
    
    const xScale = d3.scaleBand()
      .domain(sortedData.map(d => d.year))
      .range([0, innerWidth])
      .padding(0.15);
      
    // dynamic y-scale based on data
    const maxValue = d3.max(sortedData, d => d.percent_forest_lost);
    const yScale = d3.scaleLinear()
      .domain([0, maxValue * 1.1])
      .range([innerHeight, 0]);
  
    // svg
    const svg = d3.create("svg")
      .attr("width", width)
      .attr("height", height)
      .style("background", "white")
      .style("font", "10px system-ui");
  
    const g = svg.append("g")
      .attr("transform", `translate(${margin.left},${margin.top})`);
    
    // y-axis with grid lines
    const yTicks = Math.max(4, Math.min(10, Math.floor((width * 0.6) / 60)));
    const yAxisGroup = g.append("g").attr("class", "y-axis");
    const yAxisCall = d3.axisLeft(yScale)
      .ticks(yTicks)
      .tickSizeOuter(0)
      .tickSizeInner(-innerWidth)
      .tickFormat(d => d.toFixed(2));
  
    yAxisGroup.call(yAxisCall);
    yAxisGroup.select(".domain").remove();
    yAxisGroup.selectAll(".tick line")
      .attr("stroke", "#f0f0f0")
      .attr("stroke-width", 1);
    yAxisGroup.selectAll(".tick text")
      .attr("fill", "currentColor")
      .attr("font-size", "10px")
      .attr("font-family", "system-ui");
      
    // data bars with dynamic color mapping
    g.selectAll(".data-bar")
      .data(sortedData.filter(d => d.percent_forest_lost > 0))
      .enter().append("rect")
      .attr("class", "data-bar")
      .attr("x", d => xScale(d.year))
      .attr("width", xScale.bandwidth())
      .attr("y", d => yScale(d.percent_forest_lost))
      .attr("height", d => innerHeight - yScale(d.percent_forest_lost))
      .attr("fill", d => deforestationColorMap[d.year])
      .attr("fill-opacity", 1)
      .attr("stroke", d => d3.color(deforestationColorMap[d.year]).darker(0.5))
      .attr("stroke-width", 1)
      .style("cursor", "default")
      .on("mouseover", function(event, d) {
        d3.selectAll(".d3-tooltip").remove();
  
        const tooltip = d3.select("body").append("div")
          .attr("class", "d3-tooltip")
          .style("position", "absolute")
          .style("background", "white")
          .style("color", "black")
          .style("padding", "8px 12px")
          .style("border", "1.8px solid #000000")
          .style("font-family", "system-ui")
          .style("font-size", "12px")
          .style("line-height", "1.4")
          .style("box-shadow", "0 2px 8px rgba(0,0,0,0.15)")
          .style("pointer-events", "none")
          .style("z-index", "1000")
          .style("opacity", 0);
  
        tooltip.html(`<div>Year: ${d.year}</div><div>Forest Lost: ${d.percent_forest_lost.toFixed(2)}%</div>`)
          .style("left", (event.pageX - 60) + "px")
          .style("top", (event.pageY - 70) + "px")
          .transition()
          .duration(200)
          .style("opacity", 1);
      })
      .on("mousemove", function(event) {
        const tooltip = d3.select(".d3-tooltip");
        if (!tooltip.empty()) {
          tooltip
            .style("left", (event.pageX - 60) + "px")
            .style("top", (event.pageY - 70) + "px");
        }
      })
      .on("mouseout", function() {
        d3.selectAll(".d3-tooltip")
          .transition()
          .duration(200)
          .style("opacity", 0)
          .remove();
      });
  
    // x-axis (dynamically adjust tick frequency based on data length)
    const xAxisGroup = g.append("g")
      .attr("class", "x-axis")
      .attr("transform", `translate(0,${innerHeight})`);
    
    const numYears = sortedData.length;
    const tickInterval = Math.max(1, Math.ceil(numYears / Math.floor(width / 50)));
    const tickValues = sortedData
      .filter((d, i) => i % tickInterval === 0)
      .map(d => d.year);
      
    xAxisGroup.call(d3.axisBottom(xScale)
      .tickSizeOuter(0)
      .tickSizeInner(0)
      .tickValues(tickValues));
      
    xAxisGroup.select(".domain")
      .attr("stroke", "currentColor")
      .attr("stroke-width", 1);
    xAxisGroup.selectAll(".tick text")
      .attr("fill", "currentColor")
      .attr("font-size", "10px")
      .attr("font-family", "system-ui")
      .attr("dy", "1.5em");

      
    if (width < 600) {
      xAxisGroup.selectAll("text")
        .style("text-anchor", "end")
        .attr("dx", "-.8em")
        .attr("dy", ".15em")
        .attr("transform", "rotate(-45)");
    }
      
    // title
    svg.append("text")
      .attr("x", 20)
      .attr("y", 25)
      .attr("text-anchor", "start")
      .attr("fill", "currentColor")
      .attr("font-size", "18px") 
      .attr("font-family", "system-ui")
      .text(`Annual Deforestation as Percentage of Original Forest, ${minYear}-${maxYear}`);
      
    // subtitle with dynamic year range
    const titleLocation = countryName ? `${cityName}, ${countryName}` : cityName;
    svg.append("text")
      .attr("x", 20)
      .attr("y", 45)
      .attr("text-anchor", "start")
      .attr("fill", "currentColor")
      .attr("font-size", "16px")
      .attr("font-family", "system-ui")
      .attr("font-style", "italic")
      .text(`${titleLocation}`);
      
    // y-axis label
    svg.append("text")
      .attr("transform", "rotate(-90)")
      .attr("y", 20)
      .attr("x", -(margin.top + innerHeight/2))
      .attr("text-anchor", "middle")
      .attr("fill", "currentColor")
      .attr("font-size", "11px")
      .attr("font-family", "system-ui")
      .text(yLabel);
      
    // x-axis label
    svg.append("text")
      .attr("x", margin.left + innerWidth/2)
      .attr("y", height - 45)
      .attr("text-anchor", "middle")
      .attr("fill", "currentColor")
      .attr("font-size", "11px")
      .attr("font-family", "system-ui")
      .text(xLabel);
      
    return svg.node();
  }

// function with d3.js that plots deforestation_area data for the "annual deforestation as percentage of total deforestation" using styling for visual cohesion with deforestation map (i.e., City Scan, Climate Conditions, Forests & Deforestation, 2000-2020* (actually 2025, since data goes to 2023) map)
function plot_deforestation_area4(deforestation_area, {
    cityName = "City", 
    countryName = "",
    width = plotWidth,
    xLabel = "Year",
    yLabel = "Percent of Total Deforestation (%)",
  } = {}) {
    
    // sort data by year
    const sortedData = deforestation_area.slice().sort((a, b) => a.year - b.year);
  
    // calculate total cumulative deforestation (last/final/ultimate "year" entry)
    const totalDeforestation = sortedData[sortedData.length - 1].cumulative_deforested;
    
    // add percentage of total deforestation to each data point
    const dataWithPercentages = sortedData.map(d => ({
      ...d,
      percent_of_total_deforestation: (d.deforested_this_year / totalDeforestation) * 100
    }));
  
    // year range from data
    const minYear = d3.min(sortedData, d => d.year);
    const maxYear = d3.max(sortedData, d => d.year);
    
    // color scale (for visual cohesion with deforestation map),  where: light yellow (early); dark yellow (mid-early); orange (mid-recent); dark red (recent)
      const colorScale = d3.scaleLinear()
      .domain([
        minYear, 
        minYear + (maxYear - minYear) * 0.33,
        minYear + (maxYear - minYear) * 0.67,
        maxYear
      ])
      .range(["#f3f14d", "#f2cc69", "#eead70", "#e47673"])
      .interpolate(d3.interpolateRgb);
    
    // create color map for all years in data
    const deforestationColorMap = {};
    sortedData.forEach(d => {
      deforestationColorMap[d.year] = colorScale(d.year);
    });
    
    const height = width * 0.6;
    const margin = {
      top: 70,
      right: Math.max(20, width * 0.02), 
      bottom: Math.max(80, width * 0.1),
      left: Math.max(80, width * 0.08)
    };
    const innerWidth = width - margin.left - margin.right;
    const innerHeight = height - margin.top - margin.bottom;
    
    const xScale = d3.scaleBand()
      .domain(dataWithPercentages.map(d => d.year))
      .range([0, innerWidth])
      .padding(0.15);
      
    // dynamic y-scale based on percentage of total
    const maxValue = d3.max(dataWithPercentages, d => d.percent_of_total_deforestation);
    const yScale = d3.scaleLinear()
      .domain([0, maxValue * 1.1])
      .range([innerHeight, 0]);
  
    // svg
    const svg = d3.create("svg")
      .attr("width", width)
      .attr("height", height)
      .style("background", "white")
      .style("font", "10px system-ui");
  
    const g = svg.append("g")
      .attr("transform", `translate(${margin.left},${margin.top})`);
    
    // y-axis with grid lines
    const yTicks = Math.max(4, Math.min(10, Math.floor((width * 0.6) / 60)));
    const yAxisGroup = g.append("g").attr("class", "y-axis");
    const yAxisCall = d3.axisLeft(yScale)
      .ticks(yTicks)
      .tickSizeOuter(0)
      .tickSizeInner(-innerWidth)
      .tickFormat(d => d.toFixed(0) + "%");
  
    yAxisGroup.call(yAxisCall);
    yAxisGroup.select(".domain").remove();
    yAxisGroup.selectAll(".tick line")
      .attr("stroke", "#f0f0f0")
      .attr("stroke-width", 1);
    yAxisGroup.selectAll(".tick text")
      .attr("fill", "currentColor")
      .attr("font-size", "10px")
      .attr("font-family", "system-ui");
      
    // data bars with dynamic color mapping
    g.selectAll(".data-bar")
      .data(dataWithPercentages.filter(d => d.percent_of_total_deforestation > 0))
      .enter().append("rect")
      .attr("class", "data-bar")
      .attr("x", d => xScale(d.year))
      .attr("width", xScale.bandwidth())
      .attr("y", d => yScale(d.percent_of_total_deforestation))
      .attr("height", d => innerHeight - yScale(d.percent_of_total_deforestation))
      .attr("fill", d => deforestationColorMap[d.year])
      .attr("fill-opacity", 1)
      .attr("stroke", d => d3.color(deforestationColorMap[d.year]).darker(0.5))
      .attr("stroke-width", 1)
      .style("cursor", "default")
      .on("mouseover", function(event, d) {
        d3.selectAll(".d3-tooltip").remove();
  
        const tooltip = d3.select("body").append("div")
          .attr("class", "d3-tooltip")
          .style("position", "absolute")
          .style("background", "white")
          .style("color", "black")
          .style("padding", "8px 12px")
          .style("border", "1.8px solid #000000")
          .style("font-family", "system-ui")
          .style("font-size", "12px")
          .style("line-height", "1.4")
          .style("box-shadow", "0 2px 8px rgba(0,0,0,0.15)")
          .style("pointer-events", "none")
          .style("z-index", "1000")
          .style("opacity", 0);
  
        tooltip.html(`<div>Year: ${d.year}</div><div>Percent of Total Deforestation: ${d.percent_of_total_deforestation.toFixed(2)}%</div>`)
          .style("left", (event.pageX - 60) + "px")
          .style("top", (event.pageY - 90) + "px") //70
          .transition()
          .duration(200)
          .style("opacity", 1);
      })
      .on("mousemove", function(event) {
        const tooltip = d3.select(".d3-tooltip");
        if (!tooltip.empty()) {
          tooltip
            .style("left", (event.pageX - 60) + "px")
            .style("top", (event.pageY - 70) + "px");
        }
      })
      .on("mouseout", function() {
        d3.selectAll(".d3-tooltip")
          .transition()
          .duration(200)
          .style("opacity", 0)
          .remove();
      });
  
    // x-axis (dynamically adjust tick frequency based on data length)
    const xAxisGroup = g.append("g")
      .attr("class", "x-axis")
      .attr("transform", `translate(0,${innerHeight})`);
    
    const numYears = dataWithPercentages.length;
    const tickInterval = Math.max(1, Math.ceil(numYears / Math.floor(width / 50)));
    const tickValues = dataWithPercentages
      .filter((d, i) => i % tickInterval === 0)
      .map(d => d.year);
      
    xAxisGroup.call(d3.axisBottom(xScale)
      .tickSizeOuter(0)
      .tickSizeInner(0)
      .tickValues(tickValues));
      
    xAxisGroup.select(".domain")
      .attr("stroke", "currentColor")
      .attr("stroke-width", 1);
    xAxisGroup.selectAll(".tick text")
      .attr("fill", "currentColor")
      .attr("font-size", "10px")
      .attr("font-family", "system-ui")
      .attr("dy", "1.5em");

      
    if (width < 600) {
      xAxisGroup.selectAll("text")
        .style("text-anchor", "end")
        .attr("dx", "-.8em")
        .attr("dy", ".15em")
        .attr("transform", "rotate(-45)");
    }
      
    // title
    svg.append("text")
      .attr("x", 20)
      .attr("y", 25)
      .attr("text-anchor", "start")
      .attr("fill", "currentColor")
      .attr("font-size", "18px") 
      .attr("font-family", "system-ui")
      .text(`Annual Deforestation as Percentage of Total Deforestation, ${minYear}-${maxYear}`);
      
    // subtitle with dynamic year range
    const titleLocation = countryName ? `${cityName}, ${countryName}` : cityName;
    svg.append("text")
      .attr("x", 20)
      .attr("y", 45)
      .attr("text-anchor", "start")
      .attr("fill", "currentColor")
      .attr("font-size", "16px")
      .attr("font-family", "system-ui")
      .attr("font-style", "italic")
      .text(`${titleLocation}`);
      
    // y-axis label
    svg.append("text")
      .attr("transform", "rotate(-90)")
      .attr("y", 20)
      .attr("x", -(margin.top + innerHeight/2))
      .attr("text-anchor", "middle")
      .attr("fill", "currentColor")
      .attr("font-size", "11px")
      .attr("font-family", "system-ui")
      .text(yLabel);
      
    // x-axis label
    svg.append("text")
      .attr("x", margin.left + innerWidth/2)
      .attr("y", height - 45)
      .attr("text-anchor", "middle")
      .attr("fill", "currentColor")
      .attr("font-size", "11px")
      .attr("font-family", "system-ui")
      .text(xLabel);
      
    return svg.node();
  }

// function with d3.js that plots deforestation_area data in small-multiple form showing year-by-year forest compostion
function plot_deforestation_area5(deforestation_area, {
    cityName = "City",
    countryName = "",
    width = plotWidth
  } = {}) {
    
    // sort data by year
    const sortedData = deforestation_area.slice().sort((a, b) => a.year - b.year);
    
    // get year range from data
    const minYear = d3.min(sortedData, d => d.year);
    const maxYear = d3.max(sortedData, d => d.year);
    const yearRange = maxYear - minYear;
    
    // create 5-year bins dynamically
    const binSize = 5;
    const bins = [];
    
    for (let startYear = minYear; startYear <= maxYear; startYear += binSize) {
      const endYear = Math.min(startYear + binSize - 1, maxYear);
      
      // get data for this bin
      const binData = sortedData.filter(d => d.year >= startYear && d.year <= endYear);
      
      // get cumulative values at END of this period (i.e., need to consider the cumulative percent lost at the end of each period, NOT just the sum of the annual losses)
      const lastYearInBin = binData[binData.length - 1];
      
      bins.push({
        label: `${startYear}`,
        startYear: startYear,
        endYear: endYear,
        percent_forest_remaining: lastYearInBin.percent_forest_remaining,
        percent_forest_lost_cumulative: lastYearInBin.percent_forest_lost,
        // forest lost DURING this period only
        percent_forest_lost_this_period: lastYearInBin.percent_forest_lost - 
          (binData[0].year === minYear ? 0 : sortedData.find(d => d.year === startYear - 1).percent_forest_lost)
      });
    }
    
    // color scale (for visual cohesion with deforestation map),  where: green (remaining forest); orange (forest lost in previous periods); dark red (forest lost in this period)
    const colors = {
      remaining: "#4CAF50",     // green - remaining forest
      lostPrevious: "#BDBDBD",  // gray - lost forest in previous periods
      lostThisPeriod: "#e47673" // red - lost forest in this period
    };
    
    // calculate dimensions
    const numMultiples = bins.length;
    const multipleWidth = Math.min(200, (width - 100) / numMultiples);
    const bubbleSize = Math.max(3, multipleWidth / 12);
    const bubbleSpacing = bubbleSize * 1.1;
    const gridSize = bubbleSpacing * 10;
    
    const totalWidth = width;
    const height = gridSize + 200;
    const startX = (width - (multipleWidth * numMultiples)) / 2;
    
    // svg
    const svg = d3.create("svg")
      .attr("width", totalWidth)
      .attr("height", height)
      .style("background", "white")
      .style("font", "10px system-ui");
    
    // title
    svg.append("text")
      .attr("x", 20)
      .attr("y", 25)
      .attr("text-anchor", "start")
      .attr("fill", "currentColor")
      .attr("font-size", "18px")
      .attr("font-family", "system-ui")
      .text(`Year-by-Year Forest Composition, ${minYear}-${maxYear}`);
    
    // subtitle
    const titleLocation = countryName ? `${cityName}, ${countryName}` : cityName;
    svg.append("text")
      .attr("x", 20)
      .attr("y", 45)
      .attr("text-anchor", "start")
      .attr("fill", "currentColor")
      .attr("font-size", "16px")
      .attr("font-family", "system-ui")
      .attr("font-style", "italic")
      .text(`${titleLocation}`);
    
    // create each small multiple
    bins.forEach((bin, binIndex) => {
      const xOffset = startX + (binIndex * multipleWidth);
      const yOffset = 80;
      
      // create 100 bubbles for this time period
      const bubbleData = [];
      let remainingCount = 0;
      let lostPreviousCount = 0;
      let lostThisPeriodCount = 0;
      
      // calculate how many bubbles for each category
      const remainingBubbles = Math.round(bin.percent_forest_remaining);
      const lostThisPeriodBubbles = Math.round(bin.percent_forest_lost_this_period);
      const lostPreviousBubbles = 100 - remainingBubbles - lostThisPeriodBubbles;
      
      for (let i = 0; i < 100; i++) {
        let type, color;
        
        // remaining forest bubbles (green)
        if (remainingCount < remainingBubbles) {
          type = "remaining";
          color = colors.remaining;
          remainingCount++;
        }
        // lost forest in previous periods bubbles (gray)
        else if (lostPreviousCount < lostPreviousBubbles) {
          type = "lostPrevious";
          color = colors.lostPrevious;
          lostPreviousCount++;
        }
        // lost forest in this period bubbles (orange)
        else {
          type = "lostThisPeriod";
          color = colors.lostThisPeriod;
          lostThisPeriodCount++;
        }
        
        const row = Math.floor(i / 10);
        const col = i % 10;
        
        bubbleData.push({
          id: `${binIndex}-${i}`,
          type: type,
          color: color,
          row: row,
          col: col,
          binIndex: binIndex
        });
      }
      
      // draw bubbles for this small multiple
      svg.selectAll(`.bubble-${binIndex}`)
        .data(bubbleData)
        .enter().append("circle")
        .attr("class", `bubble-${binIndex}`)
        .attr("cx", d => xOffset + (d.col * bubbleSpacing) + bubbleSpacing/2)
        .attr("cy", d => yOffset + (d.row * bubbleSpacing) + bubbleSpacing/2)
        .attr("r", bubbleSize/2)
        .attr("fill", d => d.color)
        .attr("stroke", d => d.type === "remaining" ? colors.remaining : 
                            d.type === "lostPrevious" ? "#999" : 
                            d3.color(colors.lostThisPeriod).darker(0.3))
        .attr("stroke-width", 0.5)
        .attr("opacity", d => d.type === "lostPrevious" ? 0.3 : 0.9);
      
      // year label above each small multiple
      svg.append("text")
        .attr("x", xOffset + gridSize/2)
        .attr("y", yOffset - 10)
        .attr("text-anchor", "middle")
        .attr("fill", "currentColor")
        .attr("font-size", "14px")
        .attr("font-family", "system-ui")
        .attr("font-weight", "bold")
        .text(bin.label);
      
      // stats below each small multiple
      svg.append("text")
        .attr("x", xOffset + gridSize/2)
        .attr("y", yOffset + gridSize + 20)
        .attr("text-anchor", "middle")
        .attr("fill", colors.remaining)
        .attr("font-size", "10px")
        .attr("font-family", "system-ui")
        .attr("font-weight", "bold")
        .text(`${bin.percent_forest_remaining.toFixed(1)}%`);
      
      svg.append("text")
        .attr("x", xOffset + gridSize/2)
        .attr("y", yOffset + gridSize + 33)
        .attr("text-anchor", "middle")
        .attr("fill", "currentColor")
        .attr("font-size", "9px")
        .attr("font-family", "system-ui")
        .text("Forest");
      
      svg.append("text")
        .attr("x", xOffset + gridSize/2)
        .attr("y", yOffset + gridSize + 53)
        .attr("text-anchor", "middle")
        .attr("fill", colors.lostThisPeriod)
        .attr("font-size", "10px")
        .attr("font-family", "system-ui")
        .text(`${bin.percent_forest_lost_cumulative.toFixed(1)}%`);
      
      svg.append("text")
        .attr("x", xOffset + gridSize/2)
        .attr("y", yOffset + gridSize + 66)
        .attr("text-anchor", "middle")
        .attr("fill", "currentColor")
        .attr("font-size", "9px")
        .attr("font-family", "system-ui")
        .text("Deforested");
    });
    
    // legend
    const legendY = height - 10;
    const legendX = 60;
    
    // green = remaining forest
    svg.append("circle")
      .attr("cx", legendX)
      .attr("cy", legendY)
      .attr("r", 6)
      .attr("fill", colors.remaining)
      .attr("opacity", 0.9);
    
    svg.append("text")
      .attr("x", legendX + 15)
      .attr("y", legendY)
      .attr("dy", "0.35em")
      .attr("fill", "currentColor")
      .attr("font-size", "11px")
      .attr("font-family", "system-ui")
      .text("= Forest Remaining");
    
    // orange = deforested forest in this period
    svg.append("circle")
      .attr("cx", legendX + 200)
      .attr("cy", legendY)
      .attr("r", 6)
      .attr("fill", colors.lostThisPeriod)
      .attr("opacity", 0.9);
    
    svg.append("text")
      .attr("x", legendX + 215)
      .attr("y", legendY)
      .attr("dy", "0.35em")
      .attr("fill", "currentColor")
      .attr("font-size", "11px")
      .attr("font-family", "system-ui")
      .text("= Deforested");
    
    return svg.node();
  }

// function with d3.js that plots deforestaiton_area data in small-multiple form showing deforestation progression over 5-year bin periods as percentage of total deforestation for 2000-2023 period
function plot_deforestation_area6(deforestation_area, {
    cityName = "City",
    countryName = "",
    width = plotWidth
  } = {}) {
    
    // sort data by year
    const sortedData = deforestation_area.slice().sort((a, b) => a.year - b.year);
    
    // get year range from data
    const minYear = d3.min(sortedData, d => d.year);
    const maxYear = d3.max(sortedData, d => d.year);
    
    // create 5-year bins dynamically
    const binSize = 5;
    const bins = [];
    
    // get total deforestation at end
    const totalDeforestation = sortedData[sortedData.length - 1].cumulative_deforested;
    
    for (let startYear = minYear; startYear <= maxYear; startYear += binSize) {
      const endYear = Math.min(startYear + binSize - 1, maxYear);
      const binData = sortedData.filter(d => d.year >= startYear && d.year <= endYear);
      const lastYearInBin = binData[binData.length - 1];
      
      // calculate what percent of TOTAL deforestation has occurred by end of this period
      const percentOfTotalDeforestation = (lastYearInBin.cumulative_deforested / totalDeforestation) * 100;
      
      bins.push({
        label: `${startYear}`,
        startYear: startYear,
        endYear: endYear,
        percentOfTotalDeforestation: percentOfTotalDeforestation,
        cumulativePixels: lastYearInBin.cumulative_deforested,
        percentForestLost: lastYearInBin.percent_forest_lost
      });
    }
    
    // color scale (for visual cohesion with deforestation map),  where: light yellow (early); dark yellow (mid-early); light orange (early mid); dark orange (late mid); red (recent)
    const colorScale = d3.scaleLinear()
      .domain([minYear, maxYear])
      .range(["#f3f14d", "#e47673"])
      .interpolate(d3.interpolateRgb);
    
    // dimensions
    const numMultiples = bins.length;
    const multipleWidth = Math.min(200, (width - 100) / numMultiples);
    const bubbleSize = Math.max(3, multipleWidth / 12);
    const bubbleSpacing = bubbleSize * 1.1;
    const gridSize = bubbleSpacing * 10;
    
    const totalWidth = width;
    const height = gridSize + 250;
    const startX = (width - (multipleWidth * numMultiples)) / 2;
    
    // svg
    const svg = d3.create("svg")
      .attr("width", totalWidth)
      .attr("height", height)
      .style("background", "white")
      .style("font", "10px system-ui");
    
    // title
    svg.append("text")
      .attr("x", 20)
      .attr("y", 25)
      .attr("text-anchor", "start")
      .attr("fill", "currentColor")
      .attr("font-size", "18px")
      .attr("font-family", "system-ui")
      .text(`Progression of Deforestation Over Time, ${minYear}-${maxYear}`);
    
    // subtitle
    const titleLocation = countryName ? `${cityName}, ${countryName}` : cityName;
    svg.append("text")
      .attr("x", 20)
      .attr("y", 45)
      .attr("text-anchor", "start")
      .attr("fill", "currentColor")
      .attr("font-size", "16px")
      .attr("font-family", "system-ui")
      .attr("font-style", "italic")
      .text(`${titleLocation}`);
    
    // description
    svg.append("text")
      .attr("x", 20)
      .attr("y", 65)
      .attr("text-anchor", "start")
      .attr("fill", "#666")
      .attr("font-size", "11px")
      .attr("font-family", "system-ui")
      .text(`100 bubbles = 100% of total deforestation (${totalDeforestation} pixels = ${sortedData[sortedData.length - 1].percent_forest_lost}% of original forest)`);
    
    // create each small multiple
    bins.forEach((bin, binIndex) => {
      const xOffset = startX + (binIndex * multipleWidth);
      const yOffset = 100;
      
      // number of bubbles = percentage of total deforestation reached
      const numBubbles = Math.round(bin.percentOfTotalDeforestation);
      
      // color based on year
      const binColor = colorScale(bin.startYear);
      
      // create bubbles
      const bubbleData = [];
      for (let i = 0; i < 100; i++) {
        const row = Math.floor(i / 10);
        const col = i % 10;
        
        bubbleData.push({
          id: `${binIndex}-${i}`,
          row: row,
          col: col,
          filled: i < numBubbles
        });
      }
      
      // draw bubbles
      svg.selectAll(`.bubble-${binIndex}`)
        .data(bubbleData)
        .enter().append("circle")
        .attr("class", `bubble-${binIndex}`)
        .attr("cx", d => xOffset + (d.col * bubbleSpacing) + bubbleSpacing/2)
        .attr("cy", d => yOffset + (d.row * bubbleSpacing) + bubbleSpacing/2)
        .attr("r", bubbleSize/2)
        .attr("fill", d => d.filled ? binColor : "currentColor")
        .attr("stroke", d => d.filled ? d3.color(binColor).darker(0.3) : "#dee2e6")
        .attr("stroke-width", 0.5)
        .attr("opacity", d => d.filled ? 0.9 : 0.1);
      
      // year label
      svg.append("text")
        .attr("x", xOffset + gridSize/2)
        .attr("y", yOffset - 10)
        .attr("text-anchor", "middle")
        .attr("fill", "currentColor")
        .attr("font-size", "14px")
        .attr("font-family", "system-ui")
        .attr("font-weight", "bold")
        .text(bin.label);
      
      // percentage of total deforestation
      svg.append("text")
        .attr("x", xOffset + gridSize/2)
        .attr("y", yOffset + gridSize + 20)
        .attr("text-anchor", "middle")
        .attr("fill", binColor)
        .attr("font-size", "12px")
        .attr("font-family", "system-ui")
        .attr("font-weight", "bold")
        .text(`${bin.percentOfTotalDeforestation.toFixed(0)}%`);
      
      svg.append("text")
        .attr("x", xOffset + gridSize/2)
        .attr("y", yOffset + gridSize + 35)
        .attr("text-anchor", "middle")
        .attr("fill", "currentColor")
        .attr("font-size", "9px")
        .attr("font-family", "system-ui")
        .text("of total");
      
      // cumulative forest loss percentage
      svg.append("text")
        .attr("x", xOffset + gridSize/2)
        .attr("y", yOffset + gridSize + 55)
        .attr("text-anchor", "middle")
        .attr("fill", "#666")
        .attr("font-size", "9px")
        .attr("font-family", "system-ui")
        .text(`(${bin.percentForestLost.toFixed(2)}% of`);
      
      svg.append("text")
        .attr("x", xOffset + gridSize/2)
        .attr("y", yOffset + gridSize + 67)
        .attr("text-anchor", "middle")
        .attr("fill", "#666")
        .attr("font-size", "9px")
        .attr("font-family", "system-ui")
        .text(`original forest)`);
    });
    
    // legend
    const legendY = height - 40;
    
    svg.append("text")
      .attr("x", width/2)
      .attr("y", legendY)
      .attr("text-anchor", "middle")
      .attr("fill", "currentColor")
      .attr("font-size", "11px")
      .attr("font-family", "system-ui")
      .text("Each filled bubble represents 1% of the total deforestation that occurred from 2001-2023");
    
    return svg.node();
  }
     
// function that plots flood events to create (scatter) flood event chart (i.e., Large flood events in xxxx)
function plot_fe(fe, {
  cityName = "City",
  countryName = "",
  width = plotWidth,
  yLabel = "Year",
  color = "black"
} = {}) {
  
  const height = width * 0.6;
  const margin = {
    top: 70,
    right: Math.max(20, width * 0.02), 
    bottom: Math.max(90, width * 0.1),
    left: Math.max(80, width * 0.08)
  };
  const innerWidth = width - margin.left - margin.right;
  const innerHeight = height - margin.top - margin.bottom;
  
  // get unique months for x-axis
  const months = Array.from(new Set(fe.map(d => d.begin_month))).sort((a, b) => a - b);
  const monthNames = fe.reduce((acc, d) => {
    if (!acc[d.begin_month]) acc[d.begin_month] = d.monthName;
    return acc;
  }, {});
  
  // scales
  const xScale = d3.scaleLinear()
    .domain([0.5, 12.5])
    .range([0, innerWidth]);
    
  const yScale = d3.scaleLinear()
    .domain([1980, 2026])
    .range([innerHeight, 0]);
  
  // size scale for bubbles based on displaced count
  const maxDisplaced = d3.max(fe, d => d.DISPLACED);
  const minDisplaced = d3.min(fe, d => d.DISPLACED);
  const rScale = d3.scaleSqrt()
    .domain([minDisplaced, maxDisplaced])
    .range([Math.max(3, Math.min(8, width / 150)), Math.max(15, Math.min(40, width / 25))]);
  
  // color scale
  const colorScale = d3.scaleOrdinal()
    .domain(["Large event", "Very large event"])
    .range(["#87CEEB", "#000080"]);

  // svg
  const svg = d3.create("svg")
    .attr("width", width)
    .attr("height", height)
    .style("background", "white")
    .style("font", "10px system-ui");

  const g = svg.append("g")
    .attr("transform", `translate(${margin.left},${margin.top})`);
  
  // y-axis with grid lines
  const yTickInterval = Math.max(5, Math.min(10, Math.floor((width * 0.6) / 40)));
  const yTickValues = d3.range(1985, 2026, yTickInterval);
  const yAxisGroup = g.append("g").attr("class", "y-axis");
  const yAxisCall = d3.axisLeft(yScale)
    .tickValues(yTickValues)
    .tickFormat(d3.format("d"))
    .tickSizeOuter(0)
    .tickSizeInner(-innerWidth);

  yAxisGroup.call(yAxisCall);
  yAxisGroup.select(".domain").remove();
  yAxisGroup.selectAll(".tick line")
    .attr("stroke", "#f0f0f0")
    .attr("stroke-width", 1);
  yAxisGroup.selectAll(".tick text")
    .attr("fill", "currentColor")
    .attr("font-size", "10px")
    .attr("font-family", "system-ui")
    .attr("font-weight", "normal")
    .attr("dx", "-0.3em");
  
  // x-axis with grid lines
  const xAxisGroup = g.append("g")
    .attr("class", "x-axis")
    .attr("transform", `translate(0,${innerHeight})`);
    
  xAxisGroup.call(d3.axisBottom(xScale)
    .tickValues(d3.range(1, 13))
    .tickFormat(d => monthNames[d] || "")
    .tickSizeOuter(0)
    .tickSizeInner(-innerHeight));
  xAxisGroup.select(".domain")
    .attr("stroke", "currentColor")
    .attr("stroke-width", 1);

  xAxisGroup.selectAll(".tick line")
    .attr("stroke", "#f0f0f0")
    .attr("stroke-width", 1);

  xAxisGroup.selectAll(".tick text")
    .attr("fill", "currentColor")
    .attr("font-size", "10px")
    .attr("font-family", "system-ui")
    .attr("font-weight", "normal")
    .attr("dy", "0.5em");
  
  // dots (bubbles) with tooltips
  g.selectAll(".dot")
    .data(fe)
    .enter().append("circle")
    .attr("class", "dot")
    .attr("cx", d => xScale(d.begin_month))
    .attr("cy", d => yScale(d.begin_year))
    .attr("r", d => rScale(d.DISPLACED))
    .attr("fill", d => colorScale(d.severity))
    .attr("fill-opacity", 0.7)
    .attr("stroke", "black")
    .attr("stroke-width", Math.max(0.5, Math.min(2, width / 400)))
    .style("cursor", "default")
    .on("mouseover", function(event, d) {
      d3.selectAll(".d3-tooltip").remove();

      const tooltip = d3.select("body").append("div")
        .attr("class", "d3-tooltip")
        .style("position", "absolute")
        .style("background", "white")
        .style("color", "black")
        .style("padding", "8px 12px")
        .style("border", "1.8px solid #000000")
        .style("font-family", "system-ui")
        .style("font-size", "12px")
        .style("font-weight", "normal")
        .style("line-height", "1.4")
        .style("box-shadow", "0 2px 8px rgba(0,0,0,0.15)")
        .style("pointer-events", "none")
        .style("z-index", "1000")
        .style("opacity", 0);
        
      tooltip.html(`<div>${d.line1}:</div><div><br/>${d.line2},<br/>${d.line3}</div>`)
        .style("left", (event.pageX - 60) + "px")
        .style("top", (event.pageY - 80) + "px")
        .transition()
        .duration(200)
        .style("opacity", 1);
    })
    .on("mousemove", function(event) {
      const tooltip = d3.select(".d3-tooltip");
      if (!tooltip.empty()) {
        tooltip
          .style("left", (event.pageX - 60) + "px")
          .style("top", (event.pageY - 80) + "px");
      }
    })
    .on("mouseout", function() {
      d3.selectAll(".d3-tooltip")
        .transition()
        .duration(200)
        .style("opacity", 0)
        .remove();
    });
  
  // title
  svg.append("text")
    .attr("x", 20)
    .attr("y", 25)
    .attr("text-anchor", "start")
    .attr("fill", "currentColor")
    .attr("font-size", "18px") 
    .attr("font-family", "system-ui")
    .attr("font-weight", "normal")
    .text("Large flood events, 1985-2025");
    
  // subtitle
  svg.append("text")
    .attr("x", 20)
    .attr("y", 45)
    .attr("text-anchor", "start")
    .attr("fill", "currentColor")
    .attr("font-size", "16px")
    .attr("font-family", "system-ui")
    .attr("font-style", "italic")
    .attr("font-weight", "normal")
    .text(`${cityName}, ${countryName}`);
  
  // legend
  const legendX = width - 180;
  const legendY = 25;
  const legendSpacing = 25;
  
  const legendGroup = svg.append("g")
    .attr("class", "legend");
  
  ["Large event", "Very large event"].forEach((severity, i) => {
    const legendItem = legendGroup.append("g")
      .attr("transform", `translate(${legendX}, ${legendY + i * legendSpacing})`);
    
    legendItem.append("circle")
      .attr("cx", 8)
      .attr("cy", 0)
      .attr("r", 6)
      .attr("fill", colorScale(severity))
      .attr("fill-opacity", 0.7)
      .attr("stroke", "black")
      .attr("stroke-width", 1);
    
    legendItem.append("text")
      .attr("x", 20)
      .attr("y", 0)
      .attr("dy", "0.32em")
      .attr("font-size", "12px")
      .attr("font-family", "system-ui")
      .text(severity);
  });
    
  // y-axis label
  svg.append("text")
    .attr("transform", "rotate(-90)")
    .attr("y", 20)
    .attr("x", -(margin.top + innerHeight/2))
    .attr("text-anchor", "middle")
    .attr("fill", "currentColor")
    .attr("font-size", "11px")
    .attr("font-family", "system-ui")
    .attr("font-weight", "normal")
    .text(yLabel);
    
  return svg.node();
}

// function with d3.js that plots fu to create fu chart (i.e., built-up area exposed to river (fluvial) flooding chart, xxxx - xxxx)
function plot_fu(fu, {
  cityName = "City",
  countryName = "",
  width = plotWidth,
  xLabel = "Year",
  yLabel = "Exposed Urban Built-up Area (sq km)",
  color = "black"
} = {}) {
  
  const height = width * 0.6;
  const margin = {
    top: 70,
    right: Math.max(20, width * 0.02), 
    bottom: Math.max(90, width * 0.1),
    left: Math.max(80, width * 0.08)
  };
  const innerWidth = width - margin.left - margin.right;
  const innerHeight = height - margin.top - margin.bottom;
  
  // get year range
  const minYear = d3.min(fu, d => d.yearName);
  const maxYear = d3.max(fu, d => d.yearName);
  
  // scales
  const xScale = d3.scaleLinear()
    .domain([1, fu.length])
    .range([0, innerWidth]);
    
  const yScale = d3.scaleLinear()
    .domain([0, Math.max(...fu.map(d => d.fu)) * 1.2])
    .range([innerHeight, 0]);

  // svg
  const svg = d3.create("svg")
    .attr("width", width)
    .attr("height", height)
    .style("background", "white")
    .style("font", "10px system-ui");

  const g = svg.append("g")
    .attr("transform", `translate(${margin.left},${margin.top})`);
  
  // y-axis with grid lines
  const yTicks = Math.max(4, Math.min(10, Math.floor(width * 0.6) / 60));
  const yAxisGroup = g.append("g").attr("class", "y-axis");
  const yAxisCall = d3.axisLeft(yScale)
    .ticks(yTicks)
    .tickSizeOuter(0)
    .tickSizeInner(-innerWidth)
    .tickFormat(d3.format("~s"));

  yAxisGroup.call(yAxisCall);
  yAxisGroup.select(".domain").remove();
  yAxisGroup.selectAll(".tick line")
    .attr("stroke", "#f0f0f0")
    .attr("stroke-width", 1);
  yAxisGroup.selectAll(".tick text")
    .attr("fill", "currentColor")
    .attr("font-size", "10px")
    .attr("font-family", "system-ui")
    .attr("font-weight", "normal")
    .attr("dx", "-0.3em");
  
  // x-axis with grid lines
  const xAxisGroup = g.append("g")
    .attr("class", "x-axis")
    .attr("transform", `translate(0,${innerHeight})`);
    
  xAxisGroup.call(d3.axisBottom(xScale)
    .ticks(Math.max(5, Math.min(15, Math.floor(width / 80))))
    .tickFormat(d => {
      const index = Math.round(d) - 1;
      return index >= 0 && index < fu.length ? d3.format("d")(fu[index].yearName) : "";
    })
    .tickSizeOuter(0)
    .tickSizeInner(-innerHeight));
  xAxisGroup.select(".domain")
    .attr("stroke", "currentColor")
    .attr("stroke-width", 1);

  xAxisGroup.selectAll(".tick line")
    .attr("stroke", "#f0f0f0")
    .attr("stroke-width", 1);

  xAxisGroup.selectAll(".tick text")
    .attr("fill", "currentColor")
    .attr("font-size", "10px")
    .attr("font-family", "system-ui")
    .attr("font-weight", "normal")
    .attr("dy", "1.5em");
  
  // line (with defined function to skip null values)
  const line = d3.line()
    .defined(d => d.fu !== null)
    .x(d => xScale(d.year))
    .y(d => yScale(d.fu));
    
  g.append("path")
    .datum(fu)
    .attr("fill", "none")
    .attr("stroke", "black")
    .attr("stroke-width", Math.max(1.5, Math.min(3, width / 400)))
    .attr("d", line);
  
  // invisible dots for tooltips (line chart style - no visible dots)
  g.selectAll(".dot")
    .data(fu.filter(d => d.fu !== null))
    .enter().append("circle")
    .attr("class", "dot")
    .attr("cx", d => xScale(d.year))
    .attr("cy", d => yScale(d.fu))
    .attr("r", 4) // slightly larger invisible hit area
    .attr("fill", "transparent")
    .style("cursor", "default")
    .on("mouseover", function(event, d) {
      d3.selectAll(".d3-tooltip").remove();

      const tooltip = d3.select("body").append("div")
        .attr("class", "d3-tooltip")
        .style("position", "absolute")
        .style("background", "white")
        .style("color", "black")
        .style("padding", "8px 12px")
        .style("border", "1.8px solid #000000")
        .style("font-family", "system-ui")
        .style("font-size", "12px")
        .style("font-weight", "normal")
        .style("line-height", "1.4")
        .style("box-shadow", "0 2px 8px rgba(0,0,0,0.15)")
        .style("pointer-events", "none")
        .style("z-index", "1000")
        .style("opacity", 0);
        
      tooltip.html(`<div>Year: ${d.yearName}</div><div>${yLabel}: ${d.fu.toLocaleString()}</div>`)
        .style("left", (event.pageX - 60) + "px")
        .style("top", (event.pageY - 60) + "px")
        .transition()
        .duration(200)
        .style("opacity", 1);
    })
    .on("mousemove", function(event) {
      const tooltip = d3.select(".d3-tooltip");
      if (!tooltip.empty()) {
        tooltip
          .style("left", (event.pageX - 60) + "px")
          .style("top", (event.pageY - 60) + "px");
      }
    })
    .on("mouseout", function() {
      d3.selectAll(".d3-tooltip")
        .transition()
        .duration(200)
        .style("opacity", 0)
        .remove();
    });
  
  // title
  svg.append("text")
    .attr("x", 20)
    .attr("y", 25)
    .attr("text-anchor", "start")
    .attr("fill", "currentColor")
    .attr("font-size", "18px") 
    .attr("font-family", "system-ui")
    .attr("font-weight", "normal")
    .text(`Built-up Area Exposed to Fluvial Flooding, ${minYear}-${maxYear}`);
    
  // subtitle
  svg.append("text")
    .attr("x", 20)
    .attr("y", 45)
    .attr("text-anchor", "start")
    .attr("fill", "currentColor")
    .attr("font-size", "16px")
    .attr("font-family", "system-ui")
    .attr("font-style", "italic")
    .attr("font-weight", "normal")
    .text(`${cityName}, ${countryName}`);
    
  // y-axis label
  svg.append("text")
    .attr("transform", "rotate(-90)")
    .attr("y", 20)
    .attr("x", -(margin.top + innerHeight/2))
    .attr("text-anchor", "middle")
    .attr("fill", "currentColor")
    .attr("font-size", "11px")
    .attr("font-family", "system-ui")
    .attr("font-weight", "normal")
    .text(yLabel);

  // x-axis label
  svg.append("text")
    .attr("x", margin.left + innerWidth/2)
    .attr("y", height - 45)
    .attr("text-anchor", "middle")
    .attr("fill", "currentColor")
    .attr("font-size", "11px")
    .attr("font-family", "system-ui")
    .attr("font-weight", "normal")
    .text(xLabel);
    
  return svg.node();
}
